content: Introducing EkaPolyPhaia™, Canurta's groundbreaking, first-in-class platform that enables the consistent supply and production of rare polyphenols for the first time ever in both clinical and commercial settings. We have uncovered remarkable opportunities to create advantageous modifications within the chemical subspaces of novel polyphenols and related molecules. By bringing together multiple, proprietary processing platforms, Canurta paves the way for boundless possibilities in designing and testing innovative molecules for both established and emerging markets.
